sentences.literal: Music is heaven and earth's harmony;
Ritual is heaven and earth's order.
Harmonious, therefore the hundred things all transform;
Ordered, therefore the grouped things all distinguish.
Music is made by heaven, ritual is formulated by earth.
Exceeding formulation then chaotic, exceeding making then tyrannical.

sentences.chinese: 明於天地，然後能興禮樂也。
sentences.literal: Enlightened about heaven and earth, then able to flourish ritual and music.
Discussing relationships without trouble, music's essence;
Joyful delight and love, music's appearance.
Central and upright without deviance, ritual's substance;
Solemn, respectful, reverent, obedient, ritual's formulation.

sentences.chinese: 若夫禮樂之施於金石，越於聲音，用於宗廟社稷，事于山川鬼神，則此所以與民同也。
sentences.literal: As for ritual and music's application to metal and stone, transmission through sound and tone, use in ancestral temples and altars of soil and grain, service to mountains, rivers, ghosts, spirits; then this is what unites with the people.

sentences.chinese: 王者功成作樂，治定制禮。
sentences.literal: Kings accomplish merit and make music, govern and establish ritual.

sentences.chinese: 其功大者其樂備，其治辨者其禮具。
sentences.literal: Those whose merit is great have complete music, those whose governance is clear have complete ritual.
Shield-axe dancing is not complete music;
